title: Sample Issue 1: Add documentation for new feature
body:
## Description
We need to add comprehensive documentation for the new feature that was implemented in PR #123.

## Rationale
Good documentation is essential for users to understand how to use the new feature effectively.

## Impact
This will improve the user experience and reduce support requests related to the new feature.

title: Sample Issue 2: Fix performance issue in file upload
body:
## Description
There's a performance bottleneck in the file upload process that causes large files to upload slowly.

## Steps to Reproduce
1. Select a file larger than 100MB
2. Initiate the upload process
3. Observe the upload speed

## Expected Behavior
Files should upload at the maximum available bandwidth.

## Actual Behavior
Upload speed is limited to approximately 1MB/s regardless of available bandwidth.
